name: Neon Skies (FrancisVace)
description:
Drift through space as you race against a friend, or the clock, to pilot your craft around these stylised space stations and through the gates. 

Made in four days for Riverfire Game Jam.

Xbox controller/s required.

All programming, design, music etc by Luke Cameron, except:

Spaceship model by Ebal Studios: https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/73167

Skybox by TL Multimedia: https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/25117
